thread.title: Misophonia: When everyday sounds makes your skin crawl
thread.title_full: Misophonia: When everyday sounds makes your skin crawl

title: Misophonia: When everyday sounds makes your skin crawl
text:
Misophonia: When everyday sounds like chewing and clicking makes your skin crawl Share Download (4.64 MB) MP3 available 4.64 MB 
The sound of chewing may annoy you, but for some people, it literally creates a flight-or-flight response. It's a condition known as misophonia and for sufferers, it can lead to an increased heart rate, sweating and other serious physiological reactions to what are very simple everyday sounds. Duration: 10min 7sec Broadcast: Thu 9 Feb 2017, 8:30am Published: Thu 9 Feb 2017, 12:55pm
